Robert faced me now, his big bushy eyebrows shadowing his eyes. "I don't know, be honest?"

"Either way, little Lucy will be pretty confused when her brother tells her the show was recorded 20 years ago."   

"Come on, let's go grab lunch. I don't feel like reading."

"Mr. McGillian?" she asked. 

"Uh." I glanced to the side. The god-damned girl was at the front desk as well. "Sure," I said.
